title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
ue 1 will have Halsin inform you of the precautions you will have to make if he changes into his bear form. You will have the following dialogue options.

Come with me. Stay here.

Choosing dialogue 2 will have Halsin stay back and wishing you luck.

Defeating the Goblin Leaders

Minthara can be found in a room a floor above where you can find the Priestess Gut, take the stairs behind her and head right. Follow the path and you will find her by a table (X:327 Y:40) Interacting with her will star
